sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of platelet-derived growth factor receptor in the development of scleroderma fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血小板衍生生长因子在硬皮病发病中的作用。

sentences.english: Most Oni dress in tighter skins and wield huge swords.
sentences.chinese: 黑鬼长有硬皮，挥舞巨大的刀剑。

sentences.english: They still continue to buy "proper" books, too, printed on good paper and bound between hard covers.
sentences.chinese: 他们始终青睐“合宜”的书，如纸张好的硬皮书。

sentences.english: Each hard copy book will be printed with a soft cover.
sentences.chinese: 每本硬皮书印刷出版时都会带个软书皮。

sentences.english: Just cut off the crusts first to minimize the chance of scratching the paper.
sentences.chinese: 只要把面包外面的那层硬皮切掉，以免把壁纸磨破。

sentences.english: Scleroderma is presently a common disease in rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 硬皮病是自身免疫性疾病中的难治病。

sentences.english: Crusty whole wheat bread is my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢硬皮全麦面包。

sentences.english: Softens the hardened and dry cuticle, enhances the manicure process.
sentences.chinese: 软化多余及干涸的甲边硬皮，让修甲程序更完美。

sentences.english: Scleroderma is a chronic disease that lasts many months to years.
sentences.chinese: 硬皮病是一种可以持续数月至数年的疾病。

sentences.english: On our main Medical page you can find links such as What is Scleroderma ?
sentences.chinese: 在我们的医学网页上，你能够找到象什么是硬皮病？

sentences.english: Objective To study the pharmacological action of Wubi capsule on sclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究五痹胶囊治疗系统性硬皮病的药理作用。

sentences.english: Nephrogenic fibrosing dermopathy (NFD) is a newly recognized fibrosing skin condition.
sentences.chinese: 肾源性纤维化硬皮病是近年来新发现的一种皮肤病。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
